vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (CTokenCollateral.sol#1134-1196) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (CTokenCollateral.sol#1160)
	-transferFrom (CTokenCollateral.sol#1174)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (CTokenCollateral.sol#2417-2429):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CTokenCollateral.sol#2418-2419)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (CTokenCollateral.sol#2425-2426)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (CTokenCollateral.sol#2480-2490):

	- error = accrueInterest() (CTokenCollateral.sol#2481-2482)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (CTokenCollateral.sol#2487-2488)

vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setComptroller (CTokenCollateral.sol#2349-2368):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (CTokenCollateral.sol#2357-2358)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (CTokenCollateral.sol#2360-2361)

	- interestRateModel (CTokenCollateral.sol#2552-2553)

CErc20.initialize (CTokenCollateral.sol#2647-2662) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-EIP20Interface(underlying).totalSupply() (CTokenCollateral.sol#2659-2660)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (MathError err, Exp memory fraction) = divScalarByExp(scalar, divisor);
vulnerability_findings.message:
Exponential.divScalarByExpTruncate.fraction (local variable @ CTokenCollateral.sol#843) shadows:
	- Exponential.fraction (function @ CTokenCollateral.sol#1055-1057)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign

Reentrancy in CToken.borrowFresh (CTokenCollateral.sol#1933-1996):

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountBorrows (CTokenCollateral.sol#1985)
	- accountBorrows (CTokenCollateral.sol#1986)
	- totalBorrows (CTokenCollateral.sol#1987)

	- symbol (CTokenCollateral.sol#1249)
